statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM inventory WHERE physical_count > 5
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE id = 1
SELECT product_name, recorded_count FROM inventory WHERE recorded_count < physical_count
SELECT id, product_name, physical_count, recorded_count FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM inventory WHERE physical_count > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE recorded_count < 5 ORDER BY physical_count ASC
SELECT product_name, physical_count, recorded_count FROM inventory WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT recorded_count, product_name FROM inventory WHERE physical_count <> recorded_count
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9)
SELECT * FROM inventory_counts;
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM inventory_counts WHERE physical_count > 10;
SELECT product_name, recorded_count FROM inventory_counts ORDER BY recorded_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_discrepancies WHERE discrepancy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, discrepancy_reason FROM inventory_discrepancies WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
SELECT * FROM inventory_counts ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM inventory_counts WHERE physical_count > 50
SELECT * FROM inventory_discrepancies WHERE discrepancy_reason LIKE '%shortage%'
SELECT product_name, recorded_count FROM inventory_counts WHERE recorded_count < physical_count ORDER BY recorded_count ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_discrepancies WHERE discrepancy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM physical_inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM physical_inventory WHERE physical_count > 10;
SELECT transaction_date, quantity FROM inventory_transactions WHERE quantity < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, investigation_date, investigator_name FROM loss_investigation WHERE investigator_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT id, product_name AS name, recorded_count AS count FROM physical_inventory WHERE recorded_count != physical_count;
SELECT * FROM physical_inventory WHERE physical_count > recorded_count ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT product_name, physical_count, recorded_count, discrepancy_reason FROM physical_inventory WHERE discrepancy_reason IS NOT NULL AND discrepancy_reason != '' ORDER BY physical_count ASC, recorded_count ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, physical_count, recorded_count FROM physical_inventory WHERE physical_count < recorded_count AND discrepancy_reason LIKE '%missing%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, product_id, investigation_date, investigator_name FROM loss_investigation WHERE investigation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY investigation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_counts;
SELECT id, item_name, physical_count FROM inventory_counts WHERE physical_count < 10;
SELECT item_name, recorded_count FROM inventory_counts WHERE recorded_count != physical_count;
SELECT id, item_name, discrepancy_amount FROM inventory_discrepancies ORDER BY discrepancy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_investigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM inventory_counts ORDER BY item_name DESC, physical_count ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, recorded_count, physical_count FROM inventory_counts WHERE physical_count < recorded_count;
SELECT item_name, loss_amount FROM inventory_losses WHERE investigation_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM inventory_investigations WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe' AND investigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, discrepancy_amount FROM inventory_discrepancies ORDER BY discrepancy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_counts WHERE product_id = 12345
SELECT product_id, date_recorded, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT discrepancy_id, discrepancy_type, reason FROM discrepancies ORDER BY discrepancy_id DESC
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigator_id = 98765
SELECT name, department FROM investigators
SELECT * FROM inventory_counts
SELECT product_id, physical_count FROM inventory_counts ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, date_recorded, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT i.investigator_id, i.name, i.department, iv.investigation_notes FROM investigators i INNER JOIN investigations iv ON i.investigator_id = iv.investigator_id
SELECT d.discrepancy_id, d.product_id, d.discrepancy_type, i.name AS investigator_name FROM discrepancies d LEFT JOIN investigators i ON d.product_id = i.investigator_id
